content: this beautiful modern crochet blanket pattern is accessible for beginners and is a great relaxing project for makers **skill level ** beginner **language ** english **terminology ** u s terminology **please note that the medium afghan size included in this pattern is available as a free pattern containing ads on my blog all other sizes are exclusive to the printable ad-free pdf version of the pattern** > > the printable pdf version available in > both my ravelry and etsy shops https //tidd ly/3ja2rck > includes the pattern written in the > below sizes a link to a step-by-step video tutorial for the afghan size as well as a printable > cheat sheet to help keep you on track > this pattern includes the instructions for blankets in the following sizes stroller baby crib toddler small medium large & xl throws small medium large afghans twin queen & king step-by-step video tutorial is available for the afghan size on my blog follow me on social media to see
